        public Node getExit()

      • moveTo

        public void moveTo(Node n)
        Attempt to move the explorer from the current position to the Node n. Throws an IllegalArgumentException if n is not neighboring. Increment the steps taken if successful.
        Specified by:
        moveTo in interface ScramState

      • grabGold

        public void grabGold()
        Description copied from interface: ScramState
        Pick up the gold on the current tile. Throw an IllegalStateException if there is no gold at the current location, either because there never was any or because it was already picked up.
        Specified by:
        grabGold in interface ScramState

      • stepsLeft

        public int stepsLeft()
        Description copied from interface: ScramState
        Return the steps remaining to get out of the cavern. This value will change with every call to moveTo(Node), and if it reaches 0 before you get out, you have failed to get out.
        Specified by:
        stepsLeft in interface ScramState
